answers.text:
Hi Patrick, 
I was able to find an ordinance from Hillsborough County where in section 32 you can learn how their county health department deals with the sale. It appears that that a small pet pig is sold there must be a notice posted of the bill of sale and there are also fines for the failure to post notice on the sale of a pig ranging from $50 to MCA. The document that touches on that they do when such a pig is impounded by the Department of Animal Services. 
icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/12749
I hope this document is able to provide the information you are looking for. 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org
